t: Lord,*spn who can dwell in your tent? Who*ln can live on your holy mountain?
The*pn one who lives blamelessly, practices righteousness, and*ln acknowledges the truth in his heart—
who*ln does not slander with his tongue, who*ln does not harm his friend or*ln discredit his neighbor,
who*ln despises the one rejected by the Lord*s but*ln honors those who fear the Lord,*s who*ln keeps his word whatever the cost,
who*ln does not lend his silver at interest or*ln take a bribe against the innocent— the*ln one who does these things will never be shaken.
